summary: This document is an email chain forwarding a taxi receipt from Curb for a ride taken on November 15, 2019, in New York, NY. The sender mentions it is the receipt for their cab ride after their 'most recent trip on the Epstein case.'

persons.name: Suraju
persons.context: Identified as the driver of the taxi ride for which the receipt was generated.

events.title: Taxi Ride After Epstein Case Trip
events.description: A taxi ride was taken in New York, NY, with a fare of $73.70, following a trip related to the Epstein case.

keyFacts: The document is a forwarded email containing a taxi receipt from Curb for a ride on November 15, 2019.
The sender explicitly states the receipt is for their cab ride 'after the trip' on the Epstein case.
The ride occurred in New York, NY, with a total cost of $73.70 and driver named Suraju.
